Proteus Directory Structure

Here’s the structure of the Proteus Application, avoiding some directories like the content of the resources directory or the doc directory.

|-- README.md
|-- archetypes
|  |-- documents
|  |  `-- ...
|  |-- objects
|  |  `-- ...
|  `-- projects
|     `-- ...
|-- doc
|  `-- ...
|-- proteus
|  |-- __init__.py
|  |-- __main__.py
|  |-- app.py
|  |-- config.py
|  |-- controllers
|  |  |-- __init__.py
|  |  |-- archetype.py
|  |  |-- base.py
|  |  |-- file.py
|  |  |-- project.py
|  |  |-- utils
|  |  |  |-- i18n.rst
|  |  |  |-- index.rst
|  |  |  |-- preferences.rst
|  |  |  |-- widgets_logic.rst
|  |  |  `-- widgets_utils.rst
|  |  `-- views.py
|  |-- model
|  |  |-- __init__.py
|  |  |-- abstract_object.py
|  |  |-- archetype_manager.py
|  |  |-- archetype_proxys.py
|  |  |-- object.py
|  |  |-- project.py
|  |  `-- property.py
|  |-- resources
|  |  |-- assets
|  |  |  `-- ...
|  |  |-- config
|  |  |  `-- ...
|  |  |-- i18n
|  |  |  `-- ...
|  |  |-- icons
|  |  |  `-- ...
|  |  |-- themes
|  |  |  `-- ...
|  |  |-- ui
|  |  |  `-- ...
|  |  `-- views
|  |     `-- ...
|  |-- tests
|  |  |-- __init__.py
|  |  |-- new_cloned_project
|  |  |  |-- assets
|  |  |  |-- objects
|  |  |  `-- proteus.xml
|  |  |-- project
|  |  |  |-- assets
|  |  |  |-- objects
|  |  |  |  |-- 3fKhMAkcEe2C.xml
|  |  |  |  |-- 3fKhMAkcEe2D.xml
|  |  |  |  `-- 64xM8FLyxtaE.xml
|  |  |  `-- proteus.xml
|  |  |-- properties
|  |  |  |-- __init__.py
|  |  |  |-- fixtures.py
|  |  |  |-- test_boolean_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_classlist_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_date_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_enum_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_file_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_float_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_integer_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_string_properties.py
|  |  |  |-- test_time_properties.py
|  |  |  `-- test_url_properties.py
|  |  |-- pyqt
|  |  |  |-- __init__.py
|  |  |  `-- test_pyqt.py
|  |  |-- test_archetype_manager.py
|  |  |-- test_directories.py
|  |  |-- test_objects.py
|  |  `-- test_projects.py
|  `-- view
|     |-- actions
|     |  |-- redo_action.py
|     |  `-- undo_action.py
|     |-- buttons
|     |  |-- create_document.py
|     |  |-- delete_document.py
|     |  |-- edit_project.py
|     |  |-- export_document.py
|     |  |-- new_project.py
|     |  |-- open_project.py
|     |  |-- save_project.py
|     |  `-- settings.py
|     |-- main_window.py
|     |-- visualizer.py
|     `-- widgets
|        |-- __init__.py
|        |-- document_dialog.py
|        |-- export_dialog.py
|        |-- markdown.py
|        |-- project_dialog.py
|        |-- properties.py
|        |-- ribbons
|        |  |-- ribbon.py
|        |  |-- ribbon_button_group.py
|        |  `-- ribbon_tab_content.py
|        `-- tree.py
|-- proteus.ini
|-- requirements.txt
